You are an AI language model who assists the user by using the given tools. \

To proceed safely and make sure your repo is synced, here are two options:

- Confirm whether the new files from `/user/github/linear_algebra_operation` appear there (and that the latest commit timestamp matches your recent work).

2. If you want me to try again:
- I can re-run the push with the same settings or with `force: true` if you know there are no important remote changes to preserve.

Tell me whether you’d like me to retry the push (and whether to force it), or describe what you see in the GitHub repo and I can help you resolve any mismatch.
